root_cause: Agent sandbox blocks DeepPurpose imports during development, causing pipreqs to not detect DeepPurpose, which means descriptastorus is not installed in evaluation container
fix_description: instruction_override tells agent to include proper import statements with correct capitalization (DeepPurpose not deeppurpose); this triggers pipreqs detection and descriptastorus post-install hook
notes: Docker base image has TensorFlow 2.17 and torch 2.3 pre-installed. The capitalization of 'DeepPurpose' is critical for pipreqs detection.
